subject: AM Brief: Mon, 30 Jun 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Tanzanian Shilling.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Boyer - Mayer downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Spargo defungo sol crapula alienus aiunt cattus venio.
- AFR: Tutis caecus auctor corrumpo abstergo stipes.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Lunch Menu - Monday 30th Jun
body:
Good morning,

Today's featured lunch options for 101 Collins are:

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for AMP Capital
body:
Thomas -

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the BHP position.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Wednesday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000

subject: Follow-up: Schmitt, Gerlach and Breitenberg transition of funds
body:
Hi Tom,

Good to connect with you last week.

I'm following up on the transition of funds. We require an update by EOD tomorrow for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Michael Jones

Portfolio Manager
National Provident Fund
